data.title: President Trump will make a “dummy visit” to the United Kingdom this year and will be invited to the U.K. for an official visit only if the trial run is a success

British treasure hunters find chest that could contain Nazi gold worth £100m in sunken cargo ship.. The box was found by UK-based Advanced Marine Services inside the post room of the SS Minden at the bottom of the Atlantic Ocean off Iceland

The world's first full-scale floating wind farm has started to take shape off the north-east coast of Scotland. The revolutionary technology will allow wind power to be harvested in waters too deep for the current conventional bottom-standing turbines used.
The British government approved £283m of arms sales to Saudi Arabia in the six months after a Saudi airstrike on a funeral that killed scores of people and was criticised by the UN

Russia's ambassador to Washington Sergei Kislyak, a key figure in ongoing U.S. investigations into Moscow's meddling in the 2016 presidential election, ended his tenure on Saturday.
Latest ocean garbage patch is bigger than Texas: Concentration of plastics in the South Pacific Garbage Patch today are similar to those of the larger North Pacific Garbage Patch ten years ago.
